Pipe Legs & Bases

These legs are made of pipe fittings. FYI these are more expensive than you might think.

Copper

Hairpin legs are a classic that look great paired with any top. Available in coffee table, end table, or desk height. Hairpin legs are good for coffee tables but not so great at doing your hair. i need to fill some space.

Another option is to add a third piece of bar, here we have some 3-bar Hairpins finished in copper and mounted on a matching kintsugi table top. The extra support...
